menu.file.loadtitle: Load a dataset or a metadata file
menu.file.loadfilter: Supported files (XML, SAV, POR, DTA, RDS, XPT, XLSX)
messages.load.unsupported: Unsupported file format. Drop a DDI XML, SPSS (.sav), Stata (.dta), R (.rds), SAS (.sas7bdat), or Excel (.xls, .xlsx) file.
page.main.title: Metadata Publisher
page.main.body: A tool for documenting and publishing metadata using the DDI Codebook standard.
page.main.drop.title: Drop or select a metadata file
page.main.drop.body: Drag a supported file or use File > Load ..., to edit its metadata. Supported formats:
page.main.drop.formats: XML, SPSS (.sav, .por), Stata (.dta), R (.rds), SAS (.sas7bdat), Excel (.xls, .xlsx).
